daily_std_dev¶

hydrostats.data.daily_std_dev(merged_data)[source]¶

Takes a dataframe with an index of datetime type and both recorded and predicted streamflow values and calculates the daily standard deviation of the streamflow over the course of the data. Returns a dataframe with the date format as MM/DD in the index and the two columns of the data’s standard deviation
